email_subject: Recession Scenario Impact on Power and Gas
email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 02/22/2001 08:49 AM --------------------------- Enron North America Corp. From: Frank Hayden @ ENRON 02/21/2001 05:46 PM To: Tim Belden/HOU/ECT@ECT, Kevin M Presto/HOU/ECT@ECT, Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT, Scott Neal/HOU/ECT@ECT, Hunter S Shively/HOU/ECT@ECT, John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, John J Lavorato/Corp/Enron, Louise Kitchen/HOU/ECT@ECT, Thomas A Martin/HOU/ECT@ECT, Vladimir Gorny/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Recession Scenario Impact on Power and Gas Attached is a CERA presentation regarding recession impact. Feel free to call in any listen to pre-recorded discussion on slides. (approx. 20mins) CERA is forecasting some recession impact on Ca., but not enough to alleviate problem. Frank Call in number 1-888-203-1112 Passcode: 647083#
